required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evolution of Swallowing in Patients Undergoing Lateral Pharyngoplasty With Preservation Stylopharyngeal Muscle
clinical_study.official_title: Evolution of Swallowing in Patients Undergoing Lateral Pharyngoplasty With Preservation Stylopharyngeal Muscle

brief_summary.textblock: Evolution of swallowing in patients undergoing lateral pharyngoplasty with preservation stylopharyngeal muscle.

detailed_description.textblock: refer patients to the side pharyngoplasty with total preservation of stylopharyngeal muscle and evaluate the total recovery time of swallowing, making a daily assessment.

primary_outcome.measure: Evolution of swallowing in patients undergoing lateral pharyngoplasty with preservation stylopharyngeal muscle
primary_outcome.time_frame: assess progress daily until the end of swallowing dysphagia during 30 days
primary_outcome.description: refer patients with oas to the side faringolastia with total preservation stylopharyngeal muscle and evaluate recovery time of swallowing during 30 days.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of swallowing in patients undergoing lateral pharyngoplasty with preservation stylopharyngeal muscle
secondary_outcome.time_frame: assess progress daily until the end of swallowing dysphagia during 30 days
secondary_outcome.description: refer patients with oas to the side faringolastia with total preservation styleopharingeal muscle and evaluate the total recovery time of swallowing, making a daily assessment.

study_pop.textblock: patients with obstructive sleep apnea, indicating the lateral pharyngeal

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients with obstructive sleep apnea with surgical indication
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with obstructive sleep apnea without surgical indication

responsible_party.investigator_title: evolution of swallowing in patients undergoing lateral pharyngoplasty
